title: Latvia Bank Lending Rate
description: Bank Lending Rate in Latvia increased to 4.41 percent in September from 3.60 percent in August of 2022. Bank Lending Rate in Latvia averaged 4.87 percent from 2004 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 9.99 percent in April of 2010 and a record low of 2.90 percent in April of 2022. In Latvia, the bank lending rate is the average rate of interest charged on loans by commercial banks to private individuals and companies. This page provides the latest reported value for - Latvia Bank Lending Rate - plus previous releases, historical high and low, short-term forecast and long-term prediction, economic calendar, survey consensus and news.
author: European Central Bank
